entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 6:52 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure: 98.4 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
